game.path: Touhou - Cirno in Streets of Frog.sh
game.name: Touhou: Cirno in Streets of Frog
game.desc: Yokai Mountain Megacity is under attack by the criminal "Frog Syndicate", and it's up to the strongest undercover fairy police officer to stop it! Punch, kick and parry your way through an onslaught of pizza-throwing knights, pop culture references, frogs and breakable crates in this smash hit that'll make your fingers bleed! Battle your way through 10 stages of frogs, fairies and ghost cosplayers in this frantic arcade action game!
